#GCP - Block Storage and File Storage



#   Block Storage
    * Persistent Disks: 
        -   Network Block Storage
        -   Zonal
            *   Data replicated in one zone
        -   Regional Data replicated in multiple zones
            
    * Local SSDs:  
        -   Local Block Storage 
        

#   File Storage
        - Filestore
            *   High performance file storage
